metadata.description: Comprehensive city statistics database for comparison and area scaling - expanded edition
metadata.sources: Multiple: UN, World Bank, city governments, statistical offices, research estimates

geography.green_space_percent: Percentage of city that is parks/green space
geography.water_area_percent: Percentage of city area that is water

infrastructure.airports: Number of airports serving the city

climate.sunny_days_per_year: Number of sunny days per year

tourism_culture.unesco_sites: Number of UNESCO World Heritage sites
